item.title: Focused on a low price and strong performance: the new Hetzner Dedicated Root Server EX43
item.content:encoded:
• 22. March 2022

    Focused on a low price and strong performance: the new Hetzner Dedicated Root Server EX43

    The Hetzner Dedicated Root Server EX43 puts the new Intel® Core™ i5 12500 processor in the spotlight. This chip is from the twelfth generation, nicknamed "Alder Lake".
